org.jclouds.openstack.keystone.v2_0
Interface AdminClient

public interface AdminClient

Provides synchronous access to the KeyStone Admin API.

Author:
Adam Lowe
See Also:
AdminAsyncClient,

checkTokenIsValid

Boolean checkTokenIsValid(String token)
Validate a token. This is a high-performance variant of the #getToken() call that does not return any further information.

Returns:
true if the token is valid

getEndpointsForToken

listRolesOfUser

Set<org.jclouds.openstack.keystone.v2_0.domain.Role> listRolesOfUser(String userId)

the set of Roles granted to the user
